description:
Works to trees subject to TPO (No.349) 2007.
T1 - Goat Willow - Re-pollard at the previous level of about 800mm.
T2 - Russian Crab Apple - Reduce crown to clear building by about 1.5m.
T8 - Norway Maple - Reduce canopy width to clear building by 2-3m.
T10 - Reduce crown to ensure 3m clearance of building.
T11 - Russian Crab Apple - Raise/reduce canopy edge to clear the building by about 1m.
T12 - Silver Birch - Raise canopy to 5m above ground level of side adjacent to building.
T19 - Himalayan Birch - Lightly reduce crown to clear flats by 1m.
T20 - Turkish Hazel - Reduce crown to clear building by 1.5m.
T21 - Ornamental Cherry - Reduce crown to clear building by about 2m.
T22 - Himalayan Birch - As T21.
T3 - Common Lime - Reduce crown by 1-2m, shape to balance & clean out crown.
T7 - London Plane - Reduce by 30% from flats to previous reduction points to give 3-4m clearance; lift & balance crown.
T13 - Common Lime - Raise canopy to clear 2.5m over drive.
T14 - Common Lime - Raise canopy to clear 2.5m over drive & remove Wisteria from crown.
T15 - Hornbeam (x3) Raise canopy to clear 2.5m over drive & remove Wisteria from crown.
T17 - Lime - Raise canopy until clearance of 2.5m is achieved.
T18 - Lime - Raise canopy to clear drive by 2.5m.
T23 - Raise canopy to clear 2.5 above pavement
T24 - Hornbeam - Trim to clear street lamp by 1m & raise canopy to clear 2.5m above pavement.
